hero.homepage: Nurturing the Future through Sustainable Aquaculture

total-solutions.title: Elevating Your Potential through Our Total Solution
total-solutions.description: Explore STP's total solutions in aquaculture, where advanced feed production, innovative hatcheries, and sustainable farming converge to drive industry success and global sustainability.

innovation.title: Innovating the Future of Aquaculture
innovation.description: Welcome to STP Aquaculture, where our dedication to innovation and commitment to sustainability are guiding our efforts in the aquaculture industry. By embracing advanced Industry 4.0 technologies, we strive to enhance product quality and contribute to a more sustainable and efficient future.

hero.commitments: Our Commitment through Actions for Sustainable Aquaculture
hero.hatchery-farm: Welcome to STP Sustainable Hatchery & Farm
hero.technical-team: Welcome to STP Sustainable Technical Team & Mobile Lab

total-solutions.subtitle: Solutions
total-solutions.title: We Deliver Solutions to ensure aqua farmers reach their optimum potential

commitments.subtitle: Commitments
commitments.title: Sustainable Aquaculture Solutions Across the Nation
commitments.description: Explore STP's total solutions in aquaculture, where advanced and sustainable feed production, hatcheries, and farming converge all over the nation to drive industry success.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Step into the world of STP, where innovative and sustainable feed production, hatcheries, and farming converge to drive industry success. From our state-of-the-art feed production facilities that utilize cutting-edge technology and precision nutrition to ensure optimal animal health, hatchery operations, and farm management. Discover how our integrated approach enhances productivity for our partners across the nation.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: At STP, we're committed to provide solutions for your aquaculture needs with our services. Through our expertise, we excel in enhancing both the efficiency and productivity of your fish and shrimp operations.

jars.description: Located in the vibrant aquatic landscapes of Sumatra Utara, Jawa Barat, and Jawa Timur, our JAPFA Aquaculture Research Station (JARS) is dedicated to innovation. We focus on developing specialized feed formulations that support aquatic health and environmental stability. Our carefully designed feeds provide farmers with the resources they need to achieve sustainable success, enhancing both productivity and profitability.

atd.description: Our ATD Team is committed to advancing aquaculture technology and ensuring future sustainability. We develop high-quality proteins for fish and shrimp growth, improve genetic breeding for catfish, innovate aerator technology, and create automated systems for feeding and water treatment in hatcheries and farms. Our team’s expertise and dedication provide farmers with the reliable tools necessary for success, driving productivity and profitability in the aquaculture industry.

arc.description: The Aquaculture Research Center (ARC) was established to promote responsible and sustainable aquaculture. It focuses on developing cultivable fish and shrimp species. ARC researches methods for farming marine and freshwater fish in controlled environments. Their work includes producing natural feed, managing broodstock, rearing productive broodstock, conducting artificial and natural breeding, harvesting and hatching eggs, and maintaining seeds. This comprehensive approach helps advance sustainable aquaculture practices.

innovation.join-us: Join us at STP Aquaculture as we contribute to the evolution of the aquaculture industry, embracing innovation and sustainability to nourish the future.

emphasizing.title: Emphasizing Environmental Responsibility
emphasizing.description1: Our commitment to environmental sustainability is demonstrated through our rigorous initiatives designed to protect and sustain water resources. We realize that water is essential in our operations and by that, we undertake significant water conservation activities as part of our corporate social responsibility. These initiatives are especially focused around the areas of our operational units, where the impact of our efforts can directly contribute to the well-being of the local and natural  ecosystems.
emphasizing.description2: We strive to minimize our environmental footprint by implementing state-of-the-art water management and conservation technologies. Our proactive measures ensure the efficient use of water, reduce potential pollutants, and maintain the natural balance of the habitats we operate within.

empowering.title: Empowering Community
empowering.description1: We believe that aqua farmers, as well as the communities in which we operate, play a significant role in the industry. Our commitment to prioritizing sustainable aquaculture is not only marked by preserving the environment but also by raising awareness about more eco-friendly aquaculture practices. These efforts are carried out through the introduction of environmentally friendly aqua farming methods and the creation of industry-ready graduates. Additionally, we support sustainable livelihoods through initiatives in vannamei shrimp farming areas.
empowering.description2: By integrating these principles into every aspect of our business, STP Aquaculture remains steadfast in our mission to contribute positively to sustainable aquaculture practices. We are not only nurturing our operations but also ensuring a sustainable future for the next generations

about-us.introduction: Founded in 1987, as a proud member of PT Japfa Comfeed Indonesia Tbk., STP has been passionately to sustainable aquaculture. We are committed to excellence and continuously innovate to meet diverse market needs, ensuring our products and services are synonymous with quality and reliability

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.detail: At STP, we see ourselves as partners of our customers, providing comprehensive solutions that address every requirement within the aquaculture sector. Our goal is to be recognized as the go-to company for complete aquaculture support, utilizing innovation and expertise to advance the industry. We aim to enhance every aspect of aquaculture, making it more efficient, sustainable, and profitable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empowering Our Customers for Profitable Performance
mission.detail: We are committed to the success of our customers with a clear mission: to support them in achieving profitable performance and superior outcomes. Here’s how we deliver on this commitment:

deliver.title: Here’s how we deliver our commitment

values.title: Our Values
values.description: At STP, our people are the heartbeat of our company. We do things with a clear purpose and are always accountable for our actions through sustainable aquaculture. These are not just guiding principles but something we stand for in our everyday operations.

purposeful.title: Purposeful
purposeful.description: We carefully plan and think through our actions. If something doesn't benefit our customers or company, we don't do it. By being clear and decisive, we build trust and confidence in others.

responsible.title: Responsible
responsible.description: We understand that in both business and life, the journey never ends. In our ever-changing world, today's successes are quickly outpaced by new advancements. That's why we stay focused and constantly strive for improvement. Our commitment is to always deliver the best results for our customers and ourselves.

relentless.title: Relentless
relentless.description: We focus on long-term success in everything we do, from developing our employees to building strong customer relationships and supporting our communities. We're committed to a sustainable future and will continue to be a reliable presence both now and in the future.

certification.title: Our Certification
certification.description: At STP, our certifications are a testament to our dedication to operational excellence and compliance with the highest industry standards.

shrimp.title: Shrimp Hatchery
shrimp.description1: At STP Shrimp Hatchery, we produce top-quality shrimp larvae (benur) from SPF F1 broodstock. Our larvae are strong, healthy, and genetically superior. We ensure high quality through strict biosecurity measures and provide ongoing technical support for successful shrimp farming.
shrimp.description2: Our facilities are strategically located in Pidie Jaya (Aceh), Canti (Lampung), Anyer (Banten), Indramayu (West Java), Banyuwangi (East Java), Singaraja (Bali), Negara (Bali), Sumbawa (NTB), and Barru (South Sulawesi), ensuring optimal production across Indonesia.

fish.title: Fish Hatchery
fish.description1: Our fish hatchery is dedicated to cultivating superior fish broodstock, focusing on species like Tilapia and Clarias Catfish. We use advanced breeding techniques to ensure that our fish are robust, healthy, and genetically superior. By prioritizing the health and well-being of our fish, we help farmers achieve better growth rates and higher yields.
fish.description2: Our facilities are strategically located in Purwakarta, West Java; Yogyakarta; and Takisung, South Kalimantan. Each location leverages optimal local conditions and state-of-the-art technology to produce high-quality broodstock, supporting aquaculture development across Indonesia.

shrimp.title: Shrimp Farming
shrimp.description: We specialize in shrimp farming using high-quality larvae from STP Hatchery. Our larvae, known for their strong DNA, result in exceptional harvests. Committed to sustainability, we ensure the health of our shrimp and the environment. Using a Recirculated Aquaculture System (RAS), we maximize efficiency and sustainability. Our shrimp farming facilities in Banyuwangi and Situbondo (East Java) ensure optimal growth and sustainability.

fish.title: Fish Farming
fish.description: In our Tilapia farming operations, located in the pristine waters of Lake Toba, we rear superior Tilapia seedlings. The lake's unique ecosystem provides an ideal environment for Tilapia farming, resulting in high-quality fish. Additionally, our Barramundi, a marine fish with high market value, are raised with exceptional care. We provide them with eco-friendly feed to ensure their health and promote sustainability.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Quality and Safety
commitment.description: Our hatcheries specialize in producing high-quality, disease-free fry for both fish and shrimp, providing reliable foundations for sustainable aquaculture operations.

hatchery-farm.join-us: Join us at STP Aquaculture as we contribute to the evolution of the aquaculture industry, embracing innovation and sustainability to nourish the future.

section1.title: Comprehensive Services for Animal and Water Quality Diagnostic
section1.description: At STP, We assist you in monitoring all aspects of your livestock's health and help prevent various potential diseases. Our services are designed to keep your animals healthy and productive. Additionally, we provide diagnostic solutions directly to your farm with our Japfa Aquaculture Mobile Diagnostic Lab service.

section2.title: Achieve Aquaculture Excellence with STP's Technical Team
section2.description: At STP, we are dedicated to provide comprehensive solutions to our partners and customers. Through our Technical Team as the core of this commitment, known as the Shrimp & Fish Farm Technicians are specialized to support your aquaculture process, and ensuring the optimal results.

technical-team.join-us: Join us at STP Aquaculture as we contribute to the evolution of the aquaculture industry, embracing innovation and sustainability to nourish the future.

introduction.title: Elevate Your Aquaculture with STP's Premium Feeds
introduction.description: Since 1987, STP has been known for its high-quality feeds for aquaculture. Our commitment to excellence drives us to develop environmentally friendly formulas that enhance growth and optimize health, meeting the needs of international commercial fisheries.

species.title: Species
species.description: Our specialized aquafeed provides precise nutrition at every life stage for fresh water and marine fish and shrimp, that ensure optimal health and growth. We innovate constantly to offer the latest scientific solutions, helping farmers achieve the best results in growth rate, feed conversion, and animal welfare.

reasons.title: Why Choose STP Aquafeeds?
reasons.long-last: Long Lasting and Easy to Store

seafood-processing.introduction: STP's aquatic processing products cater to different market needs, including the food service industry and the retail market. Our products are known for their superior quality and reliability. We are dedicated to providing high-quality seafood directly to consumers. This reflects our commitment to excellence, ensuring that every product meets high standards for freshness, taste, and sustainability.
seafood-processing.toba-tilapia: STP's Toba Tilapia, from our integrated production in North Sumatra, offers premium quality. Our tilapia thrive in Lake Toba's pure waters, fed eco-friendly diets, and cultures sustainably in floating net cages. Our advanced processing facility preserves freshness and flavour. With ASC and BAP certifications, we assure traceability and top-notch standards for sustainability and food safety.
seafood-processing.seafood-lovers: Introducing SeafoodLovers by STP: your top choice for retail seafood. We offer a wide range of high-quality products, from fresh Pangasius Fillet to value-added fish and shrimp. Our modern processing plant in West and East Java, ensures excellent quality with strict quality control. With a secure supply chain and high safety standards, we are your trusted partner for delicious seafood, locally and globally.
seafood-processing.prime-seafood: Introducing Japfa Prime Seafood: our top-notch value-added products for the food service industry. With an integrated supply chain meeting global standards, we ensure traceability and safety. Our Product Development Team creates custom seafood value added product to global tastes and preferences.
